column4: people starting over to make "1 good one" is how we wound up with so many
lol but how did they all end up in the repositories?? lol they could of just narrowed it down and voted for the best stable one
well alsa is lower level, and has a pretty basic mixer functionality
that left room for a more advanced mixer system like pulse.... the main reason there's so many though is because applications need to be rewritten to use different ones
and who thought of that stupid jack sound server? that thing makes me mad how you have to shut off your sound system to run it, separately for a program to work
hehe, well jack was a good concept at least
